TextEng: I think we need to change your tactics.
I think I'll do better off on my own.
Text: 혼자 하는 게 더 나을 것 같아.

TextEng: I want to change the distance you stay away from me.
Text: 나한테서 떨어져 있는 거리를 바꾸고 싶어.

TextEng: Stay close.
Keep a medium distance.
Stay a long distance away from me.
Nevermind.
I want to change our agreement about when you heal me.
Text: 나를 언제 치유할지에 대한 약속을 바꾸고 싶어.

TextEng: Heal me when I drop below 75% of my total hit points.
Text: 내 생명력이 전체의 75% 이하로 떨어지면 치유해 줘.

TextEng: Heal me when I drop below 50% of my total hit points.
Text: 내 생명력이 전체의 50% 이하로 떨어지면 치유해 줘.

TextEng: Heal me when I drop below 25% of my total hit points.
Stop searching all the time.
Search while we move.
Travel in stealth mode from now on.
Stop traveling in stealth mode.
Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest.
Text: 내가 잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 도와줘.

TextEng: Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest.
Text: 내가 잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패해도 돕지 마.

TextEng: I don't want to change anything else right now.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> That seems a little expensive. I'll give you 100.
We need change way you do stuff.
Text: 우리, 네가 하는 방식 바꿔야 해.

TextEng: Me no want you here no more.
Text: 나 너 더 이상 여기 필요 없어.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> That seem high. Me give 100 only.
I could use a good rogue. Here's your 150 gold. Welcome aboard, Tomi.
Text: 훌륭한 도적이 필요해. 여기 금화 150개야. 환영해, 토미.

TextEng: Here be you 150 gold. Now you be me slave, Tomi.
Text: 여기 네 금화 150개야. 이제 너 내 노예야, 토미.

TextEng: I'll be going now.
Me go now.
125? Deal.
I could use a good rogue. Here's your 200 gold. Welcome aboard, Tomi.
Text: 훌륭한 도적이 필요해. 여기 금화 200개야. 환영해, 토미.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> That seems a little expensive. I'll give you 150.
Here be 200 gold. Now you be me slave, Tomi.
Text: 여기 금화 200. 이제 너 내 노예, 토미.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> That seem high. Me give 150 only.
I could use a good rogue. Here's your 250 gold. Welcome aboard, Tomi.
Text: 쓸만한 도적이 필요해. 여기 금화 250. 합류해, 토미.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> That seems a little expensive. I'll give you 200.
Here be 250 gold. Now you be me slave, Tomi.
Text: 여기 금화 250. 이제 너 내 노예, 토미.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> That seem high. Me give 200 only.
175? Deal.
225? Deal.
You change how far away you stay.
You need change how you heal me.
You not search all time no more.
You search all time when we move.
You stop sneaking so quiet now.
You start sneak quiet now.
If me fail on locked door or chest you help me.
Text: 나 잠긴 문이나 상자 실패하면 너 나 도와줘.

TextEng: If me fail on locked door or chest you not help me.
Text: 나 잠긴 문이나 상자 실패해도 너 나 돕지 마.

TextEng: Me not want change anything else now.
You heal if me sort of hurt (below 75% of total hit points).
Text: 나 좀 다치면 너 치유해 (총 생명력의 75% 이하).

TextEng: You heal if me wounded (below 50% of total hit points).
Text: 나 부상당하면 너 치유해 (총 생명력의 50% 이하).

TextEng: You heal if me hurt real bad (below 25% of total hit points).
Text: 나 진짜 심하게 다치면 너 치유해 (총 생명력의 25% 이하).

TextEng: Yes. Go.
No. Stay.
I don't have that kind of gold to spend on a henchman.
Text: 그 정도 금화를 동료에게 쓸 순 없어.

TextEng: Me not got that much gold for spend on you.
Text: 나 너한테 쓸 금화 그만큼 없어.

TextEng: Who are you?
I don't feel like talking right now. Goodbye.
How did you escape the prison?
I'm looking for a good rogue to help me in my mission.
Text: 내 임무를 도와줄 쓸만한 도적을 찾고 있어.

TextEng: I work for Lady Aribeth. I have been instructed to find several missing creatures that might be used to find a plague cure.
Text: 나는 아리베스 경을 위해 일해. 울부짖는 죽음 역병 치료제의 재료가 될지도 모르는 실종 생명체들을 찾으라는 지시를 받았어.

TextEng: I work for Lady Aribeth. My mission is confidential.
Text: 나는 아리베스 경을 위해 일해. 내 임무는 기밀이야.

TextEng: Why would the warden release the prisoners?
Actually, I'm looking for some hired help to assist me on my mission.
Text: 사실은 내 임무를 도와줄 사람을 고용하려고 해.

TextEng: No thanks. Goodbye.
I want to ask you some questions.
Well, I wasn't acting alone.
Text: 글쎄, 나 혼자 한 건 아니야.

TextEng: Yes, that would be me.
Who you be?
Me not wanna talk. Goodbye.
How you escapes prison?
Me looking for rogue to help on mission.
Text: 나 임무 도와줄 도적 찾는 중.

TextEng: Why warden lets everyone go?
Me looking for help in me mission.
Text: 나 임무 도와줄 사람 찾는 중.

TextEng: Me go now.
Me work for lady Aribeth. Me looking for creatures. They are important. They cure plague.
Text: 나 아리베스 경 위해 일해. 생명체들 찾는 중. 중요해. 그거 역병 고쳐.

TextEng: Me working for lady Aribeth. Can't tell you me mission. It secret.
Text: 나 아리베스 경 위해 일해. 임무 못 말해. 비밀이야.

TextEng: Me want to ask questions.
Me have lots of help!
Me greatest one there is! Me save city!
So you're working for Aribeth?
Goodbye.
You work for Aribeth? Me work for Aribeth too!
Text: 너 아리베스 위해 일해? 나도 아리베스 위해 일해!

TextEng: (Sluuurp) Oops, me sorry. So how you get hired by Aribeth?
Text: (후루룩) 어, 미안. 그래서 너 아리베스한테 어떻게 고용됐어?

TextEng: Do you intend to just sit around here, then?
You going to just sit around, huh?
Text: 그냥 여기 앉아 있을 거야, 응?

TextEng: I wouldn't mind an extra body. You're in.
Sorry, but I'm not interested. Goodbye.
Me need another man. You in.
Text: 나 사람 하나 더 필요해. 너 들어와.

TextEng: Sorry, me not interested.
Have you heard any rumors about the cult since you've come here?
Text: 여기에 온 뒤로 그 사교에 대한 소문 들은 거 있어?

TextEng: You hear any stuff about cult? Me looking for clues.
Text: 사교 얘기 들은 거 있어? 나 단서 찾는 중.

TextEng: Luskan?
So are you going to look into it some more?
So why are you standing around here? Shouldn't you be out scouring the North for this cult?
Text: 그럼 왜 여기 서 있는 거지? 그 사교를 찾아 북쪽을 뒤져야 하는 거 아니야?

TextEng: You gonna try to find out more stuff about the cult and Luskan?
Text: 사교랑 러스칸에 대해 더 알아보려는 거야?

TextEng: Why you stand around here? You supposed to be looking for cult.
Text: 왜 여기 서 있어? 너 사교 찾으러 가야 해.

TextEng: I'd like you to level up. You'd be more useful to me with a little training.
Text: 레벨업했으면 해. 조금만 훈련하면 내게 더 도움이 될 거야.

TextEng: Me want you to level up. You be better with training.
Text: 나 너 레벨업 원해. 훈련하면 더 좋아.

TextEng: I just want to talk.
Me just wanna talk.
I'd like to know a little more about you.
Text: 너에 대해 조금 더 알고 싶어.

TextEng: Continue your story from before.
Nevermind.
Me wanna know you better. Me think that important.
Text: 나 너 더 알고 싶어. 그거 중요해.

TextEng: You continue you story from before.
If we're to be companions I'd like to know more about you.
Text: 우리가 동료가 될 거라면, 너에 대해 더 알고 싶어.

TextEng: I'd like you to continue your story from before, Tomi.
Text: 토미, 아까 하던 이야기 이어 줘.

TextEng: If we be travel together, me want know more 'bout you.
Text: 우리 같이 다닐 거면, 나 너 더 알고 싶어.

TextEng: Me want you keep talking 'bout story you start before.
Text: 나 너 아까 시작한 이야기 계속 말해 줘.

TextEng: Have you always been a rogue, Tomi?
I want you to continue your story from before.
Text: 아까 하던 이야기 이어 줬으면 해.

TextEng: You always be rogue, Tomi?
Me want you to continue you story from before.
Text: 나 너 아까 하던 이야기 계속해 줘.

TextEng: You again? Are you following me around?
I'm surprised to see you here, Tomi.
Text: 여기서 보게 될 줄은 몰랐네, 토미.

TextEng: So you were conscripted into service by Aribeth?
How much would it cost to hire your services?
Goodbye.
I could use a good rogue by my side.
Text: 내 곁에 훌륭한 도적이 있으면 좋겠어.

TextEng: Do you have any information on the cult behind the Wailing Death?
Text: 울부짖는 죽음 역병 배후의 사교에 대해 아는 게 있나?

TextEng: I don't need anything right now.
I did my duty.
I know, I'm great. What can I say?
Text: 알지, 내가 대단하잖아. 뭐라 더 하겠어?

TextEng: Me do duty.
Me am so great! Me am so great!
Text: 나 진짜 최고! 나 진짜 최고!

TextEng: So you're working for Aarin Gend?
Text: 그럼 아린 겐드를 위해 일하는 거야?

TextEng: You work for Aarin Gend? Me work for Aarin too!
Text: 너 아린 겐드 위해 일해? 나도 아린 위해 일해!

TextEng: Goodbye.
Have you heard any rumors as to where the Words could be?
Text: 권능의 언령이 어디 있을지에 대한 소문 들은 거 있어?

TextEng: Why are you standing around here? Shouldn't you be looking for these Words?
Text: 왜 여기 서 있어? 그 언령들을 찾아야 하는 거 아니야?

TextEng: You heard any rumors about where Words be? Me want to find them.
Text: 언령 어디 있는지 소문 들었어? 나 그거 찾고 싶어.

TextEng: Why you stand here? You should look for Words.
Text: 왜 여기 서 있어? 너 언령 찾아야 해.

TextEng: I could use some stealth in my search for the Words.
Text: 권능의 언령을 찾는 데 은밀함이 필요해.

TextEng: Sorry, I'm not interested.
You look like sneaky guy. Me could use you in me search for Power Words.
Text: 너 몰래 다니는 사람 같아 보여. 나 권능의 언령 찾는 데 너 필요해.

TextEng: Me not like you.
It is good to see you again, Tomi.
I'm getting sick of seeing you every time I turn around!
Text: 고개 돌릴 때마다 널 보는 것도 이젠 지긋지긋하군!

TextEng: Do you know anything about the Words of Power, Tomi?
Text: 토미, 권능의 언령에 대해 아는 게 있어?

TextEng: I would be honored to have you join up with me again, Tomi.
I don't need any help right now.
Yes.
No, not now.
Yes.
No.
That's quite a long way to travel.
Running from your reputation, are you?
That be long way for you to come.
You runs from reputation, huh?
What happened then?
What happen next?
Do you always talk this much?
Text: 너 항상 이렇게 말을 많이 해?

TextEng: You always talks so much?
Do you have any advice or suggestions you can give me about my mission?
Text: 내 임무에 대해 조언이나 제안해 줄 게 있나?

TextEng: You got any hint or tip you give me 'bout this mission?
Text: 이 임무에 줄 힌트나 팁 있어?

TextEng: Tell me about the Peninsula district.
Tell me 'bout Peninsula district.
Anything else?
I think that's enough talking for now.
Me not want talk no more.
High Captains?
Tell me about the Arcane Brotherhood.
That's enough information for now.
You know stuff 'bout them Arcane Brother guys?
Text: 그 비전 결사단 사람들에 대해 아는 거 있어?

TextEng: Me not want talk no more.
Anything else?
Why? What do you know about Coldwood?
Text: 왜? 냉기숲에 대해 뭘 아는 거지?

TextEng: Why? What you knows about Coldwood?
More?
Me not think me see you here, Tomi.
Text: 나, 여기서 너 볼 줄 몰랐어, 토미.

TextEng: You again? Is you following me?
Aribeth force you to come serve here?
Text: 아리베스가 너 여기 와서 일하라 했어?

TextEng: How much it cost for you work for me again?
You know stuff 'bout that cult that spread plague?
Text: 그 역병 퍼뜨린 사교에 대해 아는 거 있어?

TextEng: Me need good rogue like you for help me.
Text: 나 너 같은 훌륭한 도적 필요해.

TextEng: Me not need nothing right now.
Luskan?
Why?
Me glad for see you again, Tomi.
Me sick of you! Everywhere me go you be there!
Text: 너 지겨워! 나 어디 가도 너 있어!

TextEng: You know stuff 'bout Words of Power, Tomi?
Text: 토미, 권능의 언령 아는 거 있어?

TextEng: Me be happy if you join me 'gain, Tomi.
Text: 너 다시 합류하면 나 행복해, 토미.

TextEng: Me not need no help right now.
Text: 나 지금 아무 도움도 필요 없어.

TextEng: Why?
That's a horrible thing to say!
That is horrible thing you says!
Aren't you frightened of the plague?
You not scared of plague?
What does that mean?
What that mean?
He hunted you for kissing his daughter?
He hunt you 'cause you kiss daughter?
So you're a convict, then?
So you be convict, then?
Why do you say that? What trouble?
Text: 왜 그렇게 말하지? 무슨 문제라도 있어?

TextEng: Why you says that? What trouble?
I'm not about to deal with a convict!
Me not deals with no convict!
What sorts of deeds are you talking about, then?
Text: 그럼 무슨 종류의 짓을 했다는 거지?

TextEng: I'm not much for heroism, myself.
I don't think I want to hear more about it, then.
What deeds you talk 'bout, then?
Me not much for hero stuff, neither.
Me not want hear more of it, then.
A medusa? Are you serious?
But a medusa is an evil monster!
Medusa? You is serious?
But medusa is evil monster!
You were an assassin? That's horrible!
Were you successful?
I don't want to hear anymore about this.
Text: 더는 이 얘기 듣고 싶지 않아.

TextEng: You was assassin? Is very bad!
You was successful?
Me want hear no more about this.
Text: 나 이 얘기 더는 듣기 싫어.

TextEng: I'd like to hear the rest now.
Fine, let's go.
I doubt I'll want to hear the rest of that.
Text: 나머지는 듣고 싶지 않을 것 같은데.

TextEng: Me want to hear rest now.
Okays, we go now.
Me doubt me wants to hear more.
Text: 나 더 듣고 싶지 않을 것 같아.

TextEng: Were you able to infiltrate his house?
Why agree to the task, then?
Text: 그럼 왜 그 일을 맡겠다고 한 거지?

TextEng: So there was considerable danger involved?
You able to get into wizard's house?
Text: 너 마법사 집에 들어갈 수 있었어?

TextEng: Why you say you do task, then?
Text: 그럼 왜 그 일 하겠다고 한 거야?

TextEng: So you in lots of danger, huh?
Why didn't you just poison his food?
Text: 왜 그냥 음식에 독을 타지 않았지?

TextEng: If he didn't notice you, wouldn't that make it easy?
Text: 그가 눈치채지 못했다면 쉬웠던 거 아니야?

TextEng: Didn't you feel bad about it at all?
Why you not just poison food?
Text: 왜 그냥 음식에 독 안 탔어?

TextEng: If he not notice you, that not be easy?
Text: 그가 너 못 봤으면 쉬웠던 거 아냐?

TextEng: You not feels bad about it?
Were you in love with her?
But it had to be an impossible situation.
You had to kill her father eventually, didn't you?
Text: 결국 그녀의 아버지를 죽여야 했잖아, 그렇지?

TextEng: You in love, no?
But it be bad situation.
You must kill girl's father soon, though.
Text: 그래도 너 결국 그 여자 아버지 죽여야 했지.

TextEng: You betrayed her. I wouldn't take it well, either.
Text: 넌 그녀를 배신했어. 나라도 쉽게 받아들이진 못했을 거야.

TextEng: Why didn't you just kill the mage and run off with the girl?
Text: 왜 그냥 그 마법사를 죽이고 그녀와 도망치지 않았지?

TextEng: What did she do about it?
You betrays her. Me not like betrays, neither.
Text: 너 그녀 배신했어. 나도 배신 싫어.

TextEng: Why you not kills mage and runs off with girl?
Text: 왜 마법사 안 죽이고 여자랑 도망 안 갔어?

TextEng: Uh-oh. What she do?
I still don't see how this all made you famous.
Text: 그래도 이게 어떻게 널 유명하게 만들었는지는 모르겠는데.

TextEng: Well, don't even think about betraying me, got it?
Text: 좋아, 하지만 나를 배신할 생각은 꿈도 꾸지 마. 알겠지?

TextEng: Me not see how this makes you famous.
Text: 나 이게 너 유명하게 한 건지 모르겠어.

TextEng: You no think to betrays me like that!
Text: 너 나 배신할 생각 하지 마!

TextEng: Well, that can't have been good.
I think I see where this is going...
I don't believe a word of it.
Oooh, that not sounds good.
Me thinking me knows where this goes...
Text: 나, 어떻게 될지 알 것 같아...

TextEng: Me not believes any of it.
So he caught you with his daughter? Did you defend her honor?
Text: 그가 네가 그의 딸과 있는 걸 들켰던 거야? 그녀의 명예를 지켰어?

TextEng: You fought him then, I take it?
So he catches you with daughter? You defends her honor?
Text: 그가 너 딸이랑 있는 거 봤어? 너 그녀 명예 지켰어?

TextEng: You fights him then, huh?
What happened then?
What happens then?
And this made you famous?
Text: 그래서 그 일로 네가 유명해졌다는 거야?

TextEng: You're making all that up!
And this make you famous?
You makes all that up!
She was angry at you for killing her father?
Text: 네가 그녀의 아버지를 죽여서 그녀가 화를 냈던 거야?

TextEng: For good reason, no doubt!
She angry 'cause you kill daddy?
Uh-huh, she have good reason!
Perhaps we'll find your friend, yet.
Text: 어쩌면 아직 네 친구를 찾을 수 있을 거야.

TextEng: Well, give it up, then. Your friend is dead, I'm sure.
Text: 그럼 포기해. 네 친구는 틀림없이 죽었어.

TextEng: Maybe we finds your friend somehow.
Text: 아마 우리 어떻게든 너 친구 찾을 거야.

TextEng: Well, you gives it up. You friend dead, me sure.
Text: 그럼 포기해. 너 친구 죽었어, 나 확신해.

TextEng: Are these the documents you're talking about?
If I find them, I'll let you know.
As long as you don't let your search interfere with your service to me!
Text: 다만, 나를 위해 하는 일에 지장만 주지 마!

TextEng: Me finds papers. This them?
If me finds them me let you know.
You not let you search get in way of stuff you do for me!
Text: 찾는다고 해서 나 위해 하는 일 방해하면 안 돼!

TextEng: Thank you, Tomi.
That's it? A simple ring?
Oh, go on. You know you want to tell me.
You'll do what I say, rogue!
You're right, I don't want to hear this.
Text: 네 말이 맞아, 이 얘기는 듣고 싶지 않네.

TextEng: Oh, you knows you wants to tell me.
You do what I says, rogue!
You is right, me not wants to hear it.
Text: 너 말 맞아, 나 그거 듣기 싫어.

TextEng: You seem to rather enjoy the fame, yourself.
Text: 너도 명성을 꽤 즐기는 것 같군.

TextEng: Why weren't you two a team?
Text: 왜 너희 둘은 한 팀이 아니었지?

TextEng: What did he do about it?
You likes fame lots, too, me thinking.
Text: 너도 명성 좋아하는 것 같아, 내 생각엔.

TextEng: Why you two not be team?
What he do?
You think he'd be thankful for the help.
Why didn't you leave him in prison?
Text: 왜 그를 감옥에 그냥 두지 않았지?

TextEng: You thinks he be thankful for help.
Why you not leaves him in prison?
Text: 왜 그를 감옥에 그냥 안 뒀어?

TextEng: If he could steal it, wouldn't that make him famous?
Text: 그가 그걸 훔칠 수 있었다면, 그걸로 유명해졌겠지?

TextEng: This Sammy sounds like a dastardly halfling.
Text: 그 새미란 녀석, 꽤 비열한 하플링처럼 들리는군.

TextEng: How could he make you take the blame?
If he could takes it, that not make him famous?
Text: 그가 그거 훔칠 수 있었으면, 유명해지는 거 아냐?

TextEng: This Sammy sound like very bad halfling.
Text: 그 새미, 아주 나쁜 하플링 같아.

TextEng: How he makes you take blame?
I'm beginning to feel sorry for this Sammy fellow.
Text: 이 새미라는 녀석이 좀 안쓰럽기까지 하네.

TextEng: So what did you do?
Me starts to feel sorry for this Sammy.
What you do then?
What did he do?
You don't sound like his 'best pal'.
I thought he just wanted to be famous?
Text: 그는 그냥 유명해지고 싶었던 거라고 생각했는데?

TextEng: What he do?
You not sounds like 'best pal'.
I thought he want only to be famous?
Text: 나, 그는 그냥 유명해지고 싶다고 생각했는데?

TextEng: Your arch-nemesis?
It sounds like you were HIS arch-nemesis.
Text: 듣자 하니 오히려 네가 그의 숙적이었던 것 같은데.

TextEng: This is a very dumb story.
Your uhhh... arch-what?
It sounds like you HIS arch-nemmy-whatever.
Text: 듣자 하니 너, 걔의 그... 숙적 뭐시기 같아.

TextEng: This be very dumb story.
Oh no!
Hee hee hee...
I've heard enough.
Me hears enough.
Why steal it if it wasn't valuable?
What were you going to do to Sammy?
Isn't that very dangerous for a young thief?
Text: 어린 도적에게 너무 위험한 거 아니야?

TextEng: Why steal if stone not worth lots?
Text: 그 돌 값 많이 안 나가면 왜 훔쳐?

TextEng: What you going to do to Sammy?
Is not dangerous for young thief?
And then?
What happened to Sammy?
That's horrible!
Serves you all right.
What happen to Sammy?
That be horrible!
It serve you all right.
Oh, he must have liked that...
But that's not true!
Tomi, you're a cruel halfling.
Oh, he like that, me sure...
Text: 오, 그거 그가 좋아했을 거야, 분명...

TextEng: But that not true!
Tomi, you is cruel halfling.
What happened to Sammy?
What happen to Sammy?
I have a ruby, here. Is this what you're looking for?
Text: 여기 루비가 있어. 네가 찾던 게 이거야?

TextEng: Perhaps we'll find your ruby sometime.
Text: 언젠가 네 루비를 찾게 될지도 몰라.

TextEng: You're all heart, Tomi.
Me has ruby. This ruby you looks for?
Text: 나 루비 있어. 이 루비 너 찾는 거야?

TextEng: Maybe we finds it sometime.
You is all heart, Tomi.
I found it in a wizard's tower, along the South Road.
Me finds in big mage tower, on South Road.
Text: 나 남쪽 길 큰 마법사 탑에서 찾았다.

TextEng: Hmm... I'm not sure I want your friendship, considering what happened to Sammy...
Text: 흠... 새미에게 있었던 일을 생각하면, 네 우정을 원하는지 잘 모르겠군...

TextEng: That's fine, Tomi. It's more than enough.
Hmm... me not sure me wants to be friend, like Sammy...
Text: 흠... 나, 새미처럼 친구 되고 싶은지 잘 모르겠어.

TextEng: That okay, Tomi. It more than good.
Just don't let it interfere with your obligation to me.
Text: 다만, 내게 대한 네 의무를 방해하지는 마.

TextEng: You no let it stops stuff you does for me!
Text: 그거 때문에 나 위해 하는 일 멈추면 안 돼!

TextEng: What went wrong?
You? A wizard? You must be joking!
What go wrong?
You? Wizard? You jokes, huh?
So you stole them?
I'm sure he meant the best for you.
Text: 그가 널 위해 최선을 바라던 건 분명해.

TextEng: You're far too impatient, Tomi.
So you steals them, huh?
Me sure wizard means to be good to you.
Text: 나 확신해, 마법사가 너한테 잘해주려 했어.

TextEng: You too impatient, Tomi.
You got your friend kicked out?
You gots friend kicked out?
Demons? So he was an evil man, then.
Why would he be summoning demons?
You know what a demon looks like, I take it?
Demon? So he bad evil man, then.
Text: 악마? 그럼 그 사람 나쁜 악한이네.

TextEng: Why he summon demon?
You knows what demon looks like?
You consorted with a demon?
Why would you think a demon could make you rich?
Text: 왜 악마가 널 부자로 만들어 줄 거라 생각한 거지?

TextEng: No! You didn't!!
You consorts with demon?
Why you thinks demon make you rich?
Text: 왜 악마가 너 부자 만들 거라 생각해?

TextEng: No! You not do that!!
Text: 안 돼! 너 그러면 안 돼!!

TextEng: So what happened?
So what happen?
Why? What did it do?
Remind me not to give you any magic treasure.
Text: 다음부턴 네게 마법 보물은 절대 안 주게 나한테 상기시켜 줘.

TextEng: I just can't believe you some times...
Text: 가끔은 네가 한 말이 정말 믿기지 않아...

TextEng: Why? What it do?
You remind me to not gives you magic stuff.
Text: 나한테 네게 마법 물건 주지 말라고 상기시켜 줘.

TextEng: Me just not believe you sometimes...
Uh-oh...
So what went wrong?
There's no wand that does that.
What did the wizard think of this?
So what go wrong?
There no wand that do that!
What wizard think?
I can't imagine he was pleased.
Did he try to kill you?
I no think he very happy, huh?
Text: 그 사람 별로 안 기뻐했지, 응?

TextEng: He try kill you, maybe?
That's horrible! Don't you feel bad at all?
Well, I would have killed you.
Just when I think you won't get any stranger...
Text: 넌 더 이상 기상천외해질 수 없다고 생각할 때마다...

TextEng: That horrible! You no feels bad?
Text: 그거 끔찍해! 너 미안 안 해?

TextEng: Me would have kill you, for sure.
Just when me think you not get stranger...
Text: 나 네가 더 이상 이상해지지 않을 거라 생각할 때마다...

TextEng: I have these ashes of an Uthgardt hero... would they serve?
Text: 우스가르트 영웅의 유해가 있는데... 이걸로 대신할 수 있을까?

TextEng: We may come across some ashes, who knows?
Text: 언젠가 유해를 얻게 될지도 몰라, 아무도 모르지.

TextEng: Keep your mind on your duty to me.
I really doubt Halasahr would be happy with that...
Text: 할라사르가 그걸 좋아할 것 같진 않은데...

TextEng: Me haves ashes of Uthgardt. Maybe they's okay?
Text: 나 우스가르트 유해 있어. 이거 괜찮아?

TextEng: We could finds ashes. Who knows?
Text: 우리 유해 찾을 수도 있어. 누가 알아?

TextEng: You keeps mind on stuff you do for me.
Text: 나 위해 하는 일에만 신경 써.

TextEng: Me doubt wizard be happy for that...
Thank you, Tomi.
That's it? A ring?
Me thank you for this, Tomi.
This be all? Me get ring?
Text: 이게 다야? 나 반지 받는 거야?

TextEng: You want to become a wizard now?
Oh... I wouldn't look him up, if I were you.
Text: 오... 나라면 그 사람 찾아가지 않겠어.

TextEng: You're not going anywhere!
You wants to be wizard now?
Oh... me suggest you not looks him up.
Text: 오... 나, 그 사람 찾아가지 말라고 말해.

TextEng: You not goes anywhere!
You still here in temples?
Are you still in the temple?
What you doings in temple?
What are you doing in a church?
It be not for long.
It is just temporary.
You not use range weapons no more. You use melee weapon, 'kay?
Text: 너 이제 원거리 무기 쓰지 마. 근접 무기 써, 알았지?

TextEng: You not use melee weapon no more. Use ranged weapons and stuff.
Text: 너 이제 근접 무기 쓰지 마. 원거리 무기 같은 거 써.

TextEng: Don't use melee weapons in combat. Only use ranged weapons.
Text: 전투에서 근접 무기 쓰지 마. 원거리 무기만 써.

TextEng: Don't use ranged weapons in combat anymore. Use your melee weapons.
Text: 전투에서 이제 원거리 무기 쓰지 마. 근접 무기를 써.

TextEng: Me not haves time for stupid stuff.
Text: 나, 바보 같은 거 할 시간 없어.

TextEng: You makes it quick, runt.
What you wants, Tomi?
I don't have time for your nonsense.
Me say forget it!
You asking me laters, then.
Huh. That be new. Okay, you spits it out.
Text: 허. 그거 새로운데. 좋아, 말해 봐.

TextEng: I said forget it.
Ask me later, then.
Well, that's new. Spit it out.
Make it quick, halfling.
What is it, Tomi?
The be no time to talk 'bout that stuff.
Me not intends to die.
You be scareds of dying, huh?
You knows good. You tells me.
Text: 너 잘 알잖아. 너 말해 봐.

TextEng: This is not the time for a philosophical discussion.
I don't intend to die.
Are you afraid of dying, Tomi?
You should know. You tell me.
Text: 넌 알 거야. 네가 말해 봐.

TextEng: You pulls together!
You thinks of better way to die, maybe?
Text: 더 나은 죽는 방법 생각할 수 있어, 어쩌면?

TextEng: You no worry, Tomi. You is too lucky to die.
Text: 걱정 마, 토미. 너 너무 운이 좋아서 안 죽어.

TextEng: You not backs out on me, is you?
Pull yourself together, already.
Look at it this way: can you think of a better way to go?
Text: 이렇게 봐: 더 나은 죽는 방법 생각할 수 있어?

TextEng: Don't worry, Tomi. You're too lucky to die.
Text: 걱정 마, 토미. 넌 너무 운이 좋아서 안 죽어.

TextEng: Are you backing out on me, then?
We goes, now...
You watches it, or me kills you myself.
Text: 조심해, 안 그럼 내가 직접 죽여.

TextEng: Me so glad you approves.
Let's just move on...
Watch it, or I kill you myself.
Text: 조심해, 안 그럼 내가 직접 죽여.

TextEng: So glad you approve.
